S01ratnml_u:rm_33.53_0: [53] yad ekasmin dine jātau dārakāv āvayor iha /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.53_1: sutā te bhadrikā khyāto mama putro 'pi bhadrikaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.54_0: [54] tad etayor hi saṃvaṃdhaṃ kartum arhāmahe dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.54_1: tad bhavān mama putrāya svātmajāṃ dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.55_1: vairotsargo bhaven nūnaṃ prītisaṃdhir na bhetsyate //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.56_1: nirītikaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ bhaved eva na saṃśayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.57_0: [57] iti me vacasā rājā prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.57_1: prārthanīyas tvayā sādho gachāstu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.59_1: bhavān api tathā kartum arhaty edan na nānyathā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.60_0: [60] evaṃ hi bhavatāṃ bhadraṃ yāvājjīvaṃ sukhaiḥ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.60_1: sarvatra maṅgalotsāhaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.61_0: [61] tad bhavān api rājendra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.62_0: [62] iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.63_0: [63] aho me jāyate kṣemaṃ yad asau kṣatriyādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.63_1: vairaṃ vihāya saṃvandhaṃ karttum ichati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.64_0: [64] tad ahaṃ tena bhūpena yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.64_1: datvaināṃ svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃdhiṃ kuryāṃ śubhāptaye //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.65_0: [65] evaṃ kṛte sadā kṣemaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.65_1: mama tasyāpi bhūpasya bhaven nūnaṃ na cānyathā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.66_0: [66] iti dhyātvā viniścitya prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.67_1: ājñāṃ śirasā dhṛtivā kariṣyāmi sadāpy ahaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.68_0: [68] evaṃ me vacasā sādho sarvam etat suvistaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.69_0: [69] iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.70_0: [70] tataḥ sa dūtas taṃ bhūpaṃ kośalādhipatiṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.71_0: [71] tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.72_0: [72] jaya deva mahārāja diṣṭyā varddhasva sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.72_1: yathābhilaṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tat siddham iti manyatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.73_0: [73] tad yathā bhavatādiṣṭaṃ tathā vijñāpitaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.74_1: sarvadā te bhaved bhadraṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.75_0: [75] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.76_0: [76] tataḥ sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto mahotsavaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.77_0: [77] tataḥ saṃprasthito lokaiḥ stūyamānaḥ surair api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.79_1: pracaran sa nṛpo tatra śrāvastyāṃ samupācarat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.80_0: [80] tatra svanagare prāptaḥ prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.81_0: [81] tāṃ bhadarikāṃ sutāṃ dṛṣṭvā suprasannāśayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.81_1: aho kṣemaṃ prajātaṃ me ity evaṃ muhur abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.82_0: [82] tatas tasyāḥ sutāyāḥ sa kṛtvā jātimahaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.82_1: sarvañ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam upādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.83_0: [83] bhadantaḥ śrūyatām asyā bhadrāyā duhitur mama /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.85_0: [85] yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ tasminn eva dine yataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.85_1: kṣemaṃ no jāyate tasmāt kṣemābhidhā bhavantv iyaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.86_0: [86] iti te jñātayaḥ sarve kṛtvaivaṃ saṃmataṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.87_0: [87] śṛṇu rājan yad asmākam abhiprāyaṃ pracakṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.87_1: tad asyā nāmadheyaṃ karotu bhuvi viśrutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.88_0: [88] yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ kṣemaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.88_1: tenāsyā kriyatāṃ nāma kṣemeti viśrutaṃ bhuvi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.89_0: [89] tathā tair gaditaṃ śrutvā rājā sa janako mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.89_1: tasyāḥ putryās tathā nāma kṣemeti prārthitaṃ vyadhāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.91_0: [91] tathā sa brahmadatto 'pi rājā svāntargṛhe gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.91_1: taṃ putrāṃ muhur ālokya prābhyanaṃdat pramoditaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.92_0: [92] tatra tasya śiśo rājā kṛtvā jātimahaṃ pitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.92_1: sarvāñ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.94_0: [94] ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā te jñātayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.94_1: sarve 'py ekatra saṃgamya mithar evaṃ samabruvan //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.95_0: [95] yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.95_1: tathāsya bhavatu kṣemaṃkara ity āhvayaṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.96_0: [96] iti te jñātayaḥ sarve brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.97_0: [97] śṛṇu rājan yad asmābhir nāmāsya kriyate śiśoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.97_1: tan nāma kṣemasaṃpannaṃ prathayatu bhāvān bhuvi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.98_0: [98] yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.99_0: [99] etat taiḥ kathitam śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.99_1: tad eva nāme putrasya tasyākarot pravisṛtaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.101_0: [1] tataḥ kramāt kumāratvam āptavān sa nṛpātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:273_0: tataḥ sa daharaḥ kāntaḥ kumāro ratilālitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.103_0: [3] tataḥ sa daharaḥ kāntaḥ kumāro ratilālitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.104_0: [4] tadā sa dārikā kṣemā prasenajitsutāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.105_0: [5] tataḥ sā bhadrikā kanyā sumatir guṇalālasāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.107_0: [7] tadā sā bhāvinī kṣemā svasakhībhiḥ samanvitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.108_1: tāṃ kṣemāṃ suṃdarīṃ draṣṭuṃ samaichad ratilālasaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.109_0: [9] tataḥ sa dūtam āhūya bodhayitvā prasādayan /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.109_1: datvā suratnamālāṃ taṃ kṣemāyāḥ preṣayet svayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.110_0: [10] tataḥ sa dūta ādāya tāṃ mālāṃ sahasā caran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.111_0: [11] tatra sa dūta ālokya sakhīm ekām upāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.111_1: tām upetya samāmaṃtrya suguptam evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.112_1: ratnamālāṃ tvam ādāya bhadre tasyai samarpaya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.113_0: [13] ity uktvā ratnamālāṃ tāṃ kṣemāsakhīkare rahaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.113_1: datvā sa dūta āmaṃtrya sahasā svapuraṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.114_0: [14] tatra sāpi sakhī tasyāḥ kṣemāyāḥ purato gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.114_1: prābhṛtaṃ tam upasthāpya rahasy evaṃ nyavedayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.115_0: [15] ayi bhadram imaṃ paśya prahitaṃ svāminā tava /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.115_1: tad idaṃ tvaṃ samāśliṣya patim iva vibhāvaya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.116_0: [16] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā lajjitāśayā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.117_0: [17] tataḥ sā kanyakā kṣemā tāṃ sakhīṃ purataḥ sthitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.118_0: [18] are re kiṃ vadasy evaṃ svāmī me kātra vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.118_1: nilajje vada tat kena prahitaṃ prābhṛtaṃ tava //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.119_0: [19] ity uktaṃ sā sakhī śrutvā kṣemāyā durituḥ prabhoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.120_0: [20] evaṃ sakhyā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā nṛpanaṃdinī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.121_0: [21] tata utthāya sā kṣemā kanyāpi sahasā pituḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.121_1: upetya caraṇau natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.122_0: [22] tāta kāmārthinī nāham api tu sadguṇārthinī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.122_1: sadguṇāṃ sādhayiṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.123_0: [23] yad ahaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajitvā samāhita /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.125_0: [25] ity arthitaṃ tayā putryā śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.126_0: [26] tataḥ sa janako rājā tāṃ kṣemāṃ svātmajāṃ priyāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.127_0: [27] naivaṃ putri mayā kartuṃ śakyate tat kṣamasva me /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.127_1: yat te janmani me rāṣṭre kṣemam evaṃ prajāyate //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.129_0: [29] tad yathā me pratijñātaṃ vacanaṃ pūrayātmaje /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.129_1: mā kṛthāḥ sarvathā kṣeme pravrajyāsādhane mama //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.130_0: [30] yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ kariṣye na tad anyathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.130_1: matveti me vacaḥ śrutvā kuladharme carātmaje //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.131_0: [31] evaṃ pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā prahatāśayā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.132_0: [32] tadā sa janako rājā dūtam āhūya sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.134_0: [34] yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.134_1: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān ādātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.135_0: [35] iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā puraḥ sa sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.136_0: [36] tatra sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.136_1: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.137_1: kośalendreṇa tad bhavāṃ śṛṇotv evaṃ bravīti saḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.138_0: [38] yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.138_1: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān āhartum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.139_0: [39] yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ karttuṃ na śakyate 'nyathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.139_1: tad ahaṃ te kumārāya dāsyāmi svātmajām imāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.140_1: preṣito 'ham iti jñātvā tat tatrāgaṃtum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.141_0: [41] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.141_1: taṃ dūtaṃ sahasāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.142_1: yat tat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ karttavyam iti kathyatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.144_0: [44] tatra sa sahasā gatvā svapuraṃ samupācaran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.144_1: nṛpatiṃ sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.145_1: tathā vijñāpitaṃ sarvaṃ tad uktaṃ yācyate śṛṇu //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.146_1: tad yat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ tvam arhasi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.147_1: iti satyaṃ parijñāya sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ prakāraya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.148_0: [48] iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā prasenajit sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.149_0: [49] tadaitat sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ śrutvā cā dārikā sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.150_0: [50] hā kiṃ mayātra karttavyaṃ vivāhāṃ me bhave yataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.151_0: [51] kāmā hi garhyate sadbhi varṇyate saugataṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.151_1: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yan me na gocaraṃ vrate //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.152_0: [52] dhig janma tasya saṃsāre yasya na gocaraṃ vrate /

S01ratnml_u:rm_33.153_0: [53] tad atra kva gamiṣyāmi nimagnā kāmapaṃkile /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.153_1: ko me trātā bhaved atra saṃbuddhād aparaḥ kṛtī //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.154_0: [54] tad atra taṃ jagannāthaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvatāyinaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.156_0: [56] yadi me daivayogena vrataṃ naiva labheya hi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.157_0: [57] saṃbuddhasmṛtijaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.158_0: [58] tad ahaṃ taṃ jagannāthaṃ smṛtvātra maraṇaṃ varaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.158_1: na tu kāmaviṣaṃ bhokṣye bhojye puṇyāmṛtaṃ dhruvaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.159_0: [59] iti niścitya sā kṣemā snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.162_1: tvam eva hi jagannātha tat te 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.163_0: [63] tan māṃ bhavodadhau magnāṃ kṛpayoddhartum arhati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.163_1: iti saṃprārthite satyo kanyayā kṣemayā tayā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.163_2: bhagavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā dadarśa tāṃ śubhāśayāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.164_0: [64] tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kṣemāṃ bodhibhāvinīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.165_0: [65] tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā kṣemā sahasotthitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.165_1: prajñapya svāsanaṃ natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.167_0: [67] iti tasyārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.167_1: tāṃ kṣemāṃ bhadrikāṃ kanyāṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.168_0: [68] mā bhaiṣi bhadrike kanye tvadīhitaṃ samṛdhyati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.168_1: tathā me śaraṇaṃ gatvā cara śubhe samāhitā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.171_0: [71] tataḥ sā muditā kanyā dṛṣṭasatyā prasāditā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.171_1: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayac caivam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.172_0: [72] bhagavan sarvavin nātha sadaivaṃ kṛpayā bhavān /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.172_1: dṛṣṭvā māṃ saugate dharme niyojya trātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.173_0: [73] ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.173_1: tathā hīti pratijñāya tathārddhyā cāśrame yayau //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.174_0: [74] tadā sā kanyakā kṣemā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.174_1: saṃsmṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prācaran muditā śubhe //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.177_0: [77] tatra sa kośaleśas taṃ brahmadattaṃ narādhipaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.179_0: [79] tataḥ sa kauśalo rājā tadvivāhadine śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.182_0: [82] tataḥ sa vidhivid dhotā śuddhāsane samāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.185_0: [85] tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatra sā kṣemā sahasodgatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.185_1: pakṣivat khaṃ samāśritya tasthau dhyātvā munīśvaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.186_0: [86] tātra sā bhāsayanty eva sthitā ciraṃ samāhitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.187_0: [87] tad dṛṣṭvā kauśalo rājā prasenajit pitāpi saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.188_0: [88] kṣemaṃkaraḥ kumāro 'pi sarve 'pi brāhmaṇāś ca te /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.188_1: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi sarve sainyagaṇā api //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.189_0: [89] paurāś cāpi striyo 'nye 'pi dārakā dārikā api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.190_1: tāṃ kṣemāṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.191_0: [91] namas te bhagini kṣeme yat te 'haṃ kāmalālasāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.191_1: pāṇiṃ grahītum ichāmi tat kṣamasva dayānidhe //
S01ratnml_u:rm_33.192_1: yat kāmān paribhuṃjīthā ity asthānam eva hi //

S01ratnml_u:rm_37.309_0: [59] bhadanta bhavatām ājñāṃ dhṛtvāhaṃ śirasā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.310_0: [60] tad bhadanta bhavāñ chāstā tad vidhiṃ me yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.311_1: śrutvānaṃdaḥ sa saṃpaśyans taṃ dvijam evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.312_0: [62] śṛṇu vipra munīndreṇa yāthādiṣṭaṃ mayā śrutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.312_1: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrīvratasya vidhiṃ kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.313_1: māghe vāpi śite pakṣe śuklapakṣe 'pi vā sadā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.318_0: [68] maṃḍalasya vahis tasya jvālāvalyā vahiḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.319_0: [69] veṣṭayitvā tato vāhye kramān saṃsthāpayed ghaṭān /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.320_0: [70] tātra śrīvasudhāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ vidhinā kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.323_0: [73] sagaṇāṃ tāṃ samāvāhya datvā pādārgham ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.324_1: tatas taddhāraṇīṃ samyak paṭhen maṃtrāṇi ca kramāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.325_0: [75] tataḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ stutvā kuryāś ca pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.325_1: puṇyānumodanāṃ cāpi kuryāc ca praṇatiṃ smaran //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.326_0: [76] kuryāt pradakṣiṇāny evam aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇamet punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.327_0: [77] tato valiṃ pradatvā ca sa bhūtān paritoṣayet /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.327_1: tataḥ kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā vratasūtraṃ ca prārthayet //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.329_0: [79] tato guruṃ samārādhya deyād dānaṃ samichitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.331_0: [81] pālanānte punaḥ snātvā tāṃ śrīdevīm anusmaran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.331_1: taddhāraṇīṃ paṭhan rātrau pūjayec ca samāhitaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.332_0: [82] evaṃ nityaṃ catuḥ saṃdhyaṃ pūjayec chrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.332_1: tat paredyus tathābhyarcya tan maṃḍalaṃ visarjayet //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.333_0: [83] tad rajāṃsi samādāya saṃnidhāya śubhe ghaṭe /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.334_0: [84] śeṣarajaḥ sa nirmālyaṃ nadyāṃ nāgān yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.335_0: [85] tatas taj jalam ādāya gṛhe gatvā samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.336_0: [86] tatas tan sagaṇaṃ cakraṃ samabhyarcya yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.337_0: [87] tathā tat sagaṇaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā kṣamārthanāṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.337_1: sāṃjaliś ca kramān natvā visarjayet prasādayan //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.338_0: [88] tadā śrīvasudhā devī svayam āgatya tadgṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.339_0: [89] tatas tatra gṛhe nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.340_1: puṇyaṃ mahad asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ vidur jināḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.341_0: [91] evaṃ mahattaraṃ puṇyaṃ vijñāya dvija tat tathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.341_1: śraddhaye tadvrataṃ kuryā yadi saṃpattim ichasi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.342_0: [92] yaś ca tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ vasudhārām anusmaran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.342_1: yat kāryyam ārabhet tasya tat sarvaṃ hi samṛddhyati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.343_0: [93] ratnārthī labhate ratnaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.343_1: bhogyārthī labhate bhogyaṃ yaso 'rthī labhate yaśaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.344_0: [94] dravyārthī labhate dravyān guṇārthī labhate guṇān /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.344_1: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ śubhārthī labhate śubhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.345_0: [95] mānyārthī labhate mānyaṃ jayārthī labhate jayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.345_1: dharmārthī labhate dharmān sukhārthī labhate sukhaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.346_0: [96] rājyārthī labhate rājyaṃ gṛhārthī labhate gṛhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.346_1: kṣetrārthī labhate kṣetrān rasārthī labhate rasān //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.347_0: [97] bhāryārthī labhate bhāryāṃ sutārthī labhate sutāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.347_1: putrārthī labhate putrān pautrārthī pautram āpnuyāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.348_0: [98] jñānārthī labhate jñānaṃ mokṣārthī mokṣam āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.350_0: [100] tato dānāni dadyāt sa śuddhaśīlaḥ samācaret /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.350_1: kṣāntiṃ ca bhāvayen nityaṃ dharmavīryyaṃ samārabhet //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.351_0: [1] tathā dhyānaṃ samādhāya prajñābdhiṃ saṃtared drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.353_0: [3] evaṃ brāhmaṇa vijñāya saddharmmaṃ yadi vāṃchasi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.353_1: tāṃ śrīdevīṃ mahālakṣmīṃ vasudhārāṃ sadā bhaja //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.354_0: [4] tathā te sarvadā gehe maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.354_1: sarvatreha paratrāpi bhaven nūnaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.355_0: [5] tathā dānāni datvā tvaṃ svayaṃ tadvrataṃ saṃcaran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.358_0: [8] iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa brāhmaṇo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.359_0: [9] tataḥ sa viṣṇudāso 'pi bhāryāṃ tāṃ dhīmatīṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.360_0: [10] priye dhanyāsi kalyāṇī yad ahaṃ tvatprayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.360_1: śrīdevyā vrataṃ ratnaṃ prāpnomi sāṃprataṃ khalu //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.361_0: [11] tad yathānena śāstrātra samādiṣṭaṃ tathā khalu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.361_1: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā vāṃchāmi carituṃ vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.362_0: [12] tat tvam api samādhāya mayā sārddhaṃ tathādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.362_1: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caritum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.363_1: bharttāraṃ taṃ samālokya punar evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.364_0: [14] tathā satyaṃ samādhāya śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatau /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.365_0: [15] ity uktvā sā satī bhadrā dhīmatī sahasādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.366_0: [16] tatas taṃ gurum ānaṃdaṃ natvā sā sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.366_1: tad vratārambham ādhātuṃ prārthayed evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.368_0: [18] tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdo jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.369_0: [19] tatra bhūśodhanaṃ kṛtvā sa ānaṃdo yathāvidhi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.370_0: [20] tathā tau daṃpatī tīrthe snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.371_0: [21] tatas tau daṃpatī tasya śāstur ādeśataḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.372_0: [22] gavyaiḥ kāmādi vastūni sarvāṇi śuddhitāny api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.373_0: [23] ādau guruṃ samabhyarcya tato ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.374_1: dhyātvā tathā samāvāhya datvā pādārgham ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.375_0: [25] tatas tāṃ sagaṇāṃ devīṃ samabhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:302_0: tatas tau sāṃjalī sthitvā prakṣitvā pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.378_0: [28] tatas tau sāṃjalī sthitvā prakṣitvā pāpadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.380_1: tataḥ kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā samāptaṃ cakratur vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.381_0: [31] tato gurus tayoḥ śāstā vratasūtraṃ samarppayat /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.382_1: kṛtvā tataḥ punaḥ snātvā devīṃ dhyātvā niṣedituḥ //

S01ratnml_u:rm_37.385_0: [35] tatas tad vratasaṃpūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ sadakṣiṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.385_1: pradatvā gurave natvā tan maṇḍalaṃ vyasarjatāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.386_0: [36] tatas tad rajam ādāya bhaṃḍāgāre yathoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.386_1: nidhāya tat sa nirmālyaṃ śeṣaṃ nadyāṃ yathāvidhiṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.387_0: [37] gurur nāgān samabhyarcya samarpya prākṣipaj jale /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.387_1: tatas taj jalam ādāya mahotsāhair gṛhaṃ yayau //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.388_0: [38] tata gṛhe tad ambhobhir abhiṣiṃcya samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.389_0: [39] tatas tau daṃpatī natvā sāṃjali sādaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.390_0: [40] tatas tasyā gṛhe devī vasundhārā svayaṃ sthitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.392_0: [42] aho satyaṃ jagacchāstur yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā khalu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.392_1: tathāvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā devyā vrataṃ carevahi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.393_0: [43] ity uktvā tau prasīdaṃtau śaraṇaṃ gatvā samāhitau /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.395_0: [45] tato 'sau yatir ānaṃdas tau samāmaṃtrya daṃpatī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.396_0: [46] tatra sa taṃ jagannāthaṃ praṇatvā sāṃjaliḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.397_0: [47] tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tam ānaṃdaṃ sabhāṃ ca tāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.398_0: [48] dhanyā sā dhīmatī śāntamatī cāpi subhāvinī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.401_0: [51] ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.401_1: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ smṛtvā nityaṃ prabhejire //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.402_0: [52] tadā tasyāḥ pitā viprā dhīmatyā duhitur gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.403_0: [53] tataḥ sa brāhmaṇo bhāryāṃ dhīmatyā mātaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.404_0: [54] kiṃ tvayānuśrutaṃ bhārye dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.405_0: [55] iti bhartrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā vismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.405_1: katham etad bhavet satyam iti taṃ patim abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.406_0: [56] iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā hariśarmāpi sa dvijaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.407_0: [57] priye śrutaṃ mayā satyaṃ dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.408_0: [58] yadi naitat pratīto 'pi janaiḥ sā dhīmatī sutā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.409_0: [59] kathaṃ saṃjāyate saṃpan mahatī te gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.409_1: etat satyaṃ tvayā putrī puro me kathyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.410_0: [60] evaṃ bhartrā samākhyātaṃ śrutva sā dhīmatīprasūḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.411_0: [61] śṛṇu sakhi sutāyā me dhīmatyā yad gṛhe 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.412_0: [62] iti śrutaṃ mayā satyaṃ draṣṭum ichāmi tat khalu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.412_1: tat tāṃ sutāṃ samāhūya samādarād ihānaya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.413_0: [63] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā supriyā sakhī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.414_0: [64] tatra sā samupāsṛtya dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhadrikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.415_0: [65] bhadre 'haṃ preṣitā mātrā tvadāhvānaṃ pratīha tat /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.416_0: [66] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā dhīmatī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.416_1: hasantī tāṃ sakhīṃ mātuḥ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.417_0: [67] ayi māṃ smarate mātā kim arthaṃ sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.417_1: tadāhaṃ na smṛtā mātrā dāridriyaduḥkhinī yadā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.418_0: [68] tathāpy ahaṃ mukhaṃ mātur draṣṭum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.419_0: [69] ity uktvā dhīmatī sātha putraṃ ca bhūṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.421_1: saṃprasthitā janaiś cāpi saha mātur gṛhe yayau //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.422_0: [72] tatra sā jananī dṛṣṭvā dhīmatīṃ tāṃ samāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.422_1: taṃ suputraṃ suputrīṃ ca paśyantī samupācaran //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.423_0: [73] tatra tāṃ jananīṃ dṛṣṭvā dhīmatī sātmajānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.426_1: dṛṣṭvā sa janako 'py evaṃ paśyan pratyudyayau mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.428_0: [78] pitāpi sa samālokya dhīmatīṃ tāṃ śubhāṃśikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.428_1: putraputryau ca saṃbhāṣya papracha kauśalaṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.429_0: [79] pitā sa jananī sāpi dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhāvinīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.429_1: pautraṃ pautrīṃ ca saṃdhṛtvā svagṛhe jagmatur mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.430_0: [80] tatra sā jananī tasyāḥ pautryāḥ pautrasya cādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.431_0: [81] tad āsanaṃ samāstīrya tāṃ putrīṃ svayam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.431_1: pautraṃ pautrīṃ ca tān sarvān saṃdhṛtvā saṃnyaveśayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.432_1: putrīṃ putram upasthāpya tasthau sā dhīmatī smitā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.433_0: [83] tām āgatāṃ samākarṇya sarve 'pi jātayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.433_1: sahasā draṣṭum āgatya sā daraṃ samupāyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.434_0: [84] tathā te vāṃdhavāḥ sarve suhṛtminrajanā api /

S01ratnml_u:rm_37.435_0: [85] tathā tāś ca bhaginyo 'pi tāsāṃ sarve 'pi cātmajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.435_1: tāṃ dhīmatīṃ tathāyātāṃ śrutvā draṣṭu samā yayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.436_0: [86] evam anye 'pi lokāś ca dhīmatīṃ tāṃ subhūṣaṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.437_1: te sajñātyādayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vismayam āyayuḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.438_1: sarve tāṃ sādaraṃ natvā paprachuḥ kuśalaṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.440_0: [90] tataḥ sā jananī tasyai dhīmatyai sādarān mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.442_0: [92] gṛhṇāṇa surasaṃ bhogyaṃ bhukṣva hṛd dhīmati priye /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.442_1: yo sauta saute ca saudārdda procyutaṃ yadabhīpsitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.443_0: [93] janako vitathya sarvo bhaginyo bhrātaro 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.443_1: bhātṛjāyāṃ sukhāś cāpi tasyāś cakruḥ samādaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.444_0: [94] tathādarāṃ kṛtaṃ sarve śrutvā sā dhīmatī tadā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.445_0: [95] naivāhaṃ mānitā hy ebhir nāyaṃ putro 'pi mānitaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:rm_37.446_1: tademe sarva ete 'pi nāpi 'paśyan mukhaṃ mama //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.447_0: [97] idānīṃ me gṛhe saṃpaj jātā tat sukhānvitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.447_1: evaṃ mate 'pi sarve māṃ mānayaṃti samādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.448_0: [98] yad ahaṃ mānitā naiva dhanam evābhimānyate /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.448_1: tad yasya taiḥ kriyate mānyaṃ sa bhuṃjyād idam ādaraṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.449_0: [99] iti sā manasā dhyātvā sarvāṇi bhūṣaṇāny api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.449_1: svāni putrasya putryāś ca saṃnirīkṣya samādade //
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.450_0: [100] tataḥ sā dhīmatī kāṃśasthālyāṃ sarvāṇi tāny api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.451_0: [1] bho bho bhavanti sarvāṇi bhūṣaṇāni priyāṇi me /
S01ratnml_u:rm_37.451_1: idaṃ saurasikaṃ bhojyaṃ prāśnuta svechayā sukhaṃ //

S01ratnml_u:rm_38.462_1: nṛpatiṃ ca samālokya svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.463_0: [60] tataḥ sa nṛpatis tena senena guruṇā saha /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.463_1: sānaṃdaṃ prerayām āsa dināni katicin mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.465_0: [62] bho maṃtriṇo janāḥ sarve vratasamayam āgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.465_1: tasmāt sarve mayā sārddhaṃ vrataṃ caritum arhatha //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.466_0: [63] tad enaṃ senam evātra pravrajyāsadguruṃ kuru /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.466_1: iti maṃtribhir ākhyātaṃ śrutvā nṛpas tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.466_2: taṃ senaṃ śāsane bauddhe prāvrājayad yathāvidhi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.467_0: [64] sātha pravrajito nāmnā śrīsenagupta ity abhūt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.469_0: [66] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā tad vrataṃ karttum ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.471_0: [68] tato bhādrapade māse dvitīyāyāṃ site tare /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.471_1: prātas tīrthe śubhe snātvā śuddhavastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.473_0: [70] tad rātrau ca samārādhya śrīdevīṃ vidhinārcayet /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.474_0: [71] tataḥ prātaḥ sa ācāryyas tīrthe snātvā suvastrabhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.477_0: [74] tatas te vratinaḥ sarve guruṃ natvā yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.479_0: [76] tatra tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ sagaṇāṃ vidhinā kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.481_0: [78] kṛtāṃjalipuṭāḥ sarve te ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.484_0: [81] tataḥ śāstā sa ācāryaḥ prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.485_0: [82] tat sūtraṃ vratinaḥ sarve ādāya guruṇārppitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.486_0: [83] yā rājño mahiṣī bhāryā cūḍadevīti viśrutā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.486_1: saikā tat sūtram ādāya ca vandhan evam ādarāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.488_1: maṇḍitā yā kare vaddham iti tyaktuṃ samaihata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.489_0: [86] tataḥ sā durmatī rājñī rakṣāsūtram api svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.490_0: [87] tasminn avasare tatra nimvadevyāḥ sakhī vanāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.491_0: [88] tatra sā tad vratotsāhaśabdaṃ śrutvā sa kautukā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.492_0: [89] cūḍadevyā yad utkṣiptaṃ sūtraṃ vātāyanād bahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.492_1: niścaran mūrddhani tasyāḥ sakhāḥ saṃnyapatad drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.493_0: [90] sā tat sūtraṃ samādāya paśyantī kim idaṃ nv iti /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.494_0: [91] tataḥ sa preṣikā devyā bhogyam aprārthayaṃty api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.494_1: tat sūtram eva dhṛtvāśu nimvavanaṃ mudācaran //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.495_0: [92] tatra sā sahasā gatvā bhartṛkāyāḥ purogatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.496_0: [93] jayo 'stu te mahādevi yad ahaṃ rājamaṃdire /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.497_0: [94] cūḍadevyā svayaṃ chitvā vratasūtram idaṃ bahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.497_1: kṣiptaṃ gavākṣaraṃdhrān me mūrddhni sajati niścarat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.498_0: [95] dṛṣṭvā tad aham ādāya vratasūtram idaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.498_1: iti matvātra te bhogyam ayācitvā vraje drutaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.499_0: [96] tathāvām api he devi dhṛtvedaṃ vratasūtrakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.500_0: [97] sā śrīdevī vasuṃdhārā dṛṣṭvā nau bhaktisādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.500_1: svayam atra samāśritya saṃdadyād api saṃpadaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.501_0: [98] yadi nau daivayogena saṃpattir nātra vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.501_1: puṇyaṃ tu khalu vidyeta tataḥ syāj janma sāphalaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.502_0: [99] iti matvātra bho devi snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.502_1: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvā vrataṃ carāvahe //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.503_0: [100] iti sakhyā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.504_0: [1] tatas tatheha evaṃ te snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛte /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.505_1: dhyātvā smṛtvā samādhāya saṃcarate vrataṃ mudā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.506_0: [3] tasminn avasare tatra sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.508_0: [5] bhadrike tvam ihāgacha cūḍadevyāḥ puro gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.509_0: [6] iti tayā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.510_0: [7] devī mātāmahī vṛddhā jyāyasī te ihāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.510_1: bhavaṃtyo darśanaṃ kartum ichantī dvāri tiṣṭhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.511_0: [8] tad bhavaṃtī samāgacha tasyā darśanam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.512_0: [9] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.512_1: na me mātāmahī kā sā dhyātvety evaṃ ca prāvadat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.513_0: [10] mama mātāmahī nāsti kāsāv iha samāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.513_1: iti proktvā tvayā dvārāt sahasā preṣyatāṃ balāt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.514_0: [11] iti devyoditaṃ śrutvā tatheti sā sakhī gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.514_1: vṛddhāṃtikam upāśritya dṛṣṭvā tām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.515_0: [12] mātāmahī na me kā cid iti devī vadaty api /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.515_1: ataḥ sā te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ naiveha samupāvrajet //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.516_0: [13] atas tvam iha mā tiṣṭha gachātaḥ sahasā vahiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.516_1: na vrajer yadi sā devī praiṣayet tvāṃ balād api //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.517_0: [14] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā tata utthitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.517_1: na tiṣṭheyam iti proktvā tataḥ śanair yayau vahiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.518_0: [15] tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī vṛddhī rūpadharā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.519_0: [16] tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā śanair dvāram upāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.520_0: [17] dārike tvam ihāgacha kiṃ cin me vacanaṃ śṛṇu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.521_0: [18] etan me vacanam śrutvā nimvadevyā purogatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.521_1: vṛddhekā te mukhaṃ draṣṭum āgateti nivedaya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.522_0: [19] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā ceṭī sādaraṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.522_1: paśyaṃti sāṃjalir natvā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.524_0: [21] ity uktvā sā sakhī tasyā nimvadevyāḥ puro gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.526_1: sahasā samupāgatya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.528_0: [25] ity uktvā sā subhadrāṃśā nimvadevī samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.529_0: [26] tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā svāsane samupāśṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.530_0: [27] kiṃ ve 'tra carase vatse tan me vaktuṃ tvam arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.530_1: kasminn arthe 'bhilāṣaṃ te tavāpi me puro vada //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.531_0: [28] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.532_1: daridritā na me saṃpad vidyate 'tra gṛhe kvacit //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.533_0: [30] vratopahārasāmagrim api kiṃ cin na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.534_1: dhyātvā smṛtvā samārādhya saṃcaritam idaṃ vrataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.535_1: tad vidhinā vrataiḥ karttuṃ śakyate na mayā tathā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.537_0: [34] etat tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā jyāyasī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.537_1: taṃ rājñīṃ sasakhīṃ bhadrāṃ samālokyaivam adiśat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.538_0: [35] siddhyatu te vrataṃ pūrṇaṃ carasvevaṃ samāhitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.538_1: śraddhayā bhaktibhāvena smṛtvā devīṃ sadā bhaja //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.540_0: [37] tatas tasyā mahādevyāḥ prabhāvena sadā tava /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.541_1: tatas tvaṃ svechayā dānaṃ datvārthibhyaḥ śubhe cara //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.544_0: [41] ity uktvā sā mahādevī tyaktvā vṛddhākṛtiṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.544_1: dhṛtvā rūpaṃ vasuṃdharyyā tasthau sarvagaṇair vṛtā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.545_1: ālokya nimvadevī sā tasthau kṣaṇaṃ suvismitā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.546_0: [43] tataḥ svapnavibuddheva sākṣāt tāṃ śrīvasuṃ dharāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.546_1: dṛṣṭvā sā sahasotthāya sāṃjali nyapatat puraḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.547_0: [44] tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī tāṃ rajñīṃ purato natāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.547_1: dhṛtvā hastena he vatsa uttiṣṭhety evam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.548_0: [45] vatse dāridryaduḥkhaṃ te naśyate sāṃprataṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.548_1: sarvadātra gṛhe saṃpat parivṛddhā bhaved api //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.549_0: [46] ity ādiṣṭaṃ tayā devyā nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.549_1: utthāya sāṃjali devīṃ prādrākṣīt tāṃ vasuṃdharāṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.550_1: paśyantī kim idaṃ svapnam ity uktvā samalokayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.551_0: [48] tataḥ sā śrivasuṃdhārā mahādevī gaṇaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.552_0: [49] tatra sā nimvadevī tāṃ śrīdevīṃ sagaṇāṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.553_0: [50] tataś caitanyam āṣādya sā rājñī paribodhitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.553_1: tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ dhātvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.557_0: [54] tad īdṛg bhavanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathodyānaṃ manoramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.558_0: [55] tadā sa nṛpatiś cūḍadevyā vrataṃ na dhāritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.559_0: [56] tataḥ so nṛpatī rājā maṃtribhiḥ paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.559_1: mahiṣīṃ tāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ sametyevam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.560_0: [57] are re hetunā kena tvayā na dhāritaṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.560_1: vratasūtraṃ kathaṃ chitvā visṛṣṭaṃ tad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.561_1: svāminaṃs api taṃ bhūpam anādṛtyyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.563_0: [60] iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.563_1: prayatnād api tāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayituṃ śaśāka na //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.564_1: sakhīm ekāṃ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.565_0: [62] sakhī tvaṃ me vacaḥ śrutvā gacha nimvavane 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.566_0: [63] svāmī sa nṛpatī rājā vrataṃ caritum ichati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.566_1: vasulakṣmyās tvayā sārddhaṃ tad āśu gamyatām iti //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.567_0: [64] sā tatheti pratiśrutya drutaṃ nimvavane gatā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.568_1: tatra tad bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau sakautukā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.569_0: [66] tataḥ sā suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā muditā vismayānvitā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.569_1: nimvadevyāḥ puro gatvā pādau natvaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.570_1: tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śrotum arhati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.571_0: [68] sa svāmī śrīvasuṃdharyyā vrataṃ carati sapriyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.572_0: [69] tattvayā saha sa svāmī vrataṃ caritum ichati /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.572_1: tat tvadāhūtaye rājñā preṣitāhaṃ tathātra hi //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.573_0: [70] tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śiro dhṛtvā samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.573_1: tad vrataṃ carituṃ bharttrā sahāśv āgaṃtum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.574_0: [71] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.574_1: tāṃ ceṭīṃ svāmino dūtīṃ samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.576_0: [73] tad ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ tatra nechāmi carituṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.577_0: [74] tad ahaṃ nāgamiṣyāmi tacchaitat kathitaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.577_1: nṛpateḥ purato gatvā vaktavyaṃ nānyathā tvayā //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.578_0: [75] iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.578_1: tāṃ rājñīṃ sāṃjalī natvā pratyāyayau nṛpālayaṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.579_0: [76] tatra sā nṛpateḥ pādau praṇamya sāṃjaliḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:316_0: tat tayā kathitaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.580_0: [77] tat tayā kathitaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.580_2: bhūyas tāṃ ceṭikāṃ dūtīṃ samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.581_0: [78] bhūyo 'pi tatra gacha tvaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.582_0: [79] ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā sā ceṭikāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.583_1: yat sā tatra mahāsaukhyaṃ bhuktvā tiṣṭhati sāṃprataṃ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.584_0: [81] yat tasyā bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.586_1: yadi tad ichasi draṣṭuṃ tatra gatvābhilokaya //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.587_0: [84] evaṃ tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā tṛṣitānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.587_1: tathā tad bhavanaṃ draṣṭuṃ sahasā gaṃtum aichata //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.588_0: [85] tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā sakhimaṃtrijanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.589_1: puṣkariṇīś ca dūrāt sa rājādrākṣīn manoharāḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.590_1: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito rājā sa śīghraṃ dvārāntike yayau //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.591_0: [88] tan nṛpaṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyāḥ sakhī drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.592_0: [89] devī prasīda yad bharttā svāmīha svayam āgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.592_1: tad bhavaṃtī prasannāsyā darśanaṃ dātum arhati //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.594_0: [91] tatra sa bhūpatī rājā praviśya maṃdire caran /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.594_1: tāṃ devīṃ samupāmaṃtrya prayayau sahite janaiḥ //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.595_0: [92] tatra taṃ prabhum āyātaṃ nimvadevī samīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.596_0: [93] tatra sa prabhur ālokya tāṃ bhāryāṃ śrīsamāṃśikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.597_0: [94] tatra tāṃ śrīsamākāraṃ nimvadevīṃ nirīkṣya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.597_1: rājā prabhuḥ svayaṃ dhṛtvā sahāsane nyaveśayat //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.598_0: [95] tatas tau daṃpatī tatra sahāsane samāśritau /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.600_0: [97] kathaṃ te bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavane 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.600_1: udyānaṃ ca manoramyaṃ jāyate tad vadasva me //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.601_1: taṃ prabhuṃ sāṃjalir natvā samālokyaivam abravīt //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.602_0: [99] śṛṇu svāmin mahārāja yadi śrotuṃ tvam ichasi /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.602_1: tathāhaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yan me saṃpat prajāyate //
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.603_0: [100] pratyahaṃ yat tvayā dattaṃ tad bhogyaṃ yācituṃ sakhī /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.605_0: [2] tad dṛṣṭvaivaṃ sakhī gṛhya kim idam iti vīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:rm_38.606_0: [3] tad dṛṣṭvāyaṃ mayā pṛṣṭā tyaktvāhāram idaṃ kutaḥ /
